name: Rambo House
description:
Rambo House is an experienced and resourceful marketing consulting firm that offers a strategic, customized and sustainable approach to meet the needs of each client and help them achieve defined and measurable results.
Rambo House is a one-stop shop that specializes in branding, communications, implementing community outreach campaigns,
social media, website development, designing and circulation of marketing collateral, community and corporate events and the fostering of local partnerships.
